stripped_text: When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in R&D, spend any number of credits. The Runner suffers 1 net damage for each credit spent this way unless they add this asset to their score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.
text: When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in R&D, spend any number of credits. The Runner suffers 1 net damage for each credit spent this way unless they add this asset to their score area as an agenda worth −1 agenda point.
title: Shi.Kyū
